enhanced_description: Promeritus Sdn Bhd is a holistic HR business and digital consulting firm, primarily focused on achieving desired organizational culture and behavior, in addition to developing the right people strategy and structure. As a wholly owned local organization with extensive expertise and experience from Asia Pacific, Europe, and the United States, Promeritus provides a comprehensive suite of services including HR Business & Digital Consulting, Social & Emotional Intelligence Organizational Development, HR Artificial Intelligence & Analytics, and Digital Learning. Their offerings feature the 'Promeritus360 elearning programe', and services to establish clear RACI and P&L responsibilities, and define Target Operating Models. These services are designed to support organizational transformation and achieve key business objectives such as boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, hiring top talent faster and more efficiently, and accelerating skill development and learning efficiency.
